Title: Torchwood
Actors: John Barrowman, Gareth David-Lloyd, Eve Myles, Naoko Mori, Burn Gorman, Kai Owen, Bill Pullman, Alexa Havins, Lauren Ambrose, Mekhi Phifer
Plot: Captain Jack Harkness, the former Time Agent and con man from the 51st century last seen traveling with the Doctor, ventures to early 21st century Cardiff. There, he becomes a member of Torchwood Institute, a renegade criminal investigation group founded by Queen Victoria to battle hostile extraterrestrial and supernatural threats.
